modName: Trixie - A Female Jester Outfit Replacement and Bunny Hat
summary: This is a complete replacement for the female jester outfit, and additional packages that replace the normal hat with bunny ears. I\'ve nicknamed the outfit \'Trixie\'.
descriptionHtml:
OVERVIEW
This is a complete replacement for the female jester outfit, and additional packages that replace the normal hat with bunny ears. I\'ve nicknamed the outfit \'Trixie\'. 

BACKGROUND 
(***spoilers***)
I was a little let down when I killed Cicero and was left with his outfit and the (lesser) jester version.  Finding most clowns disturbing and believing that his outfit reminded me of a medieval clown, I went to work to try  to update it as something my character could use without differing from the lore/clothing  in Skyrim. 
I wasn\'t planning on releasing this, but I thought I could give back to the community. My original ideas for the outfit were different, but there\'s only so much you can do without the CK. And if people are interested in Trixie, I\'ll upload my future stuff.
Oh... the bunny ears. I\'ve also included bunny ears which I designed for my character since the three-year old in me thought it  would be funny to watch kill animations with her wearing them. It is. I\'m laughing just thinking about it. And  I\'d like to make the point that it is possible the jesters had similar head gear to make the Yarl\'s giggle.

PACKAGES
trixie - vanilla.zip [complete replacement of the jester outfit]
trixie - for big girls.zip [complete replacement of the jester outfit for females with the weight slider maxed to the right - IMPORTANT: see below for information]
trixie - vanilla with bunny ears.zip [complete replacement of the jester outfit and replaces the hat with bunny ears]
trixie - big girls with bunny ears.zip [complete replacement of the jester outfit for females with the weight slider maxed to the right - IMPORTANT:  see below for information - and replaces the hat with bunny ears]
trixie - just bunny ears.zip [replaces female jester hat with bunny ears]

VERSIONS
1.1 - only the Bunny Ears files and only if you were one of the first to download the file.
1.0 - Initial Release

ISSUES
- The reason for the Big Girl version is due to the fact that a female at the maximum weight slider uses the male gloves instead of the female. If you use the Big Girl version of this mod, it will replace the default male gloves with a design that matches this mod.
- There is some clipping - mixing armour with the hat piece can create some issues.  Some of the clipping is caused by using a different body mesh rather than the default. When the CK is released, I\'ll fix these up.

HOW TO INSTALL
***For Version 1.2****
Extract the contents of the zip file into your Data folder and overwrite if prompted.

***For Version 1.0/1.1****
Extract the folders to the appropriate locations:

Textures: \\Data\\textures\\clothes\\jester

Meshes: \\Data\\Meshes\\clothes\\jester

HOW TO UNINSTALL
Remove the files contained in the archive.

CODES
000CEE6E - Shirt/Pants
000CEE70 - Boots
000CEE72 - Hat
000CEE74 - Gloves

SHAMELESS PLUG
If you liked this, you may also like my different wedding dress mod:
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4041
author: spiffy jim
